00021         void deallocate()
00022         {
00023                 if (m_clBuffer && m_ownsMemory)
00024                 {
00025                         clReleaseMemObject(m_clBuffer);
00026                 }
00027                 m_clBuffer = 0;
00028                 m_capacity=0;
00029         }

00033         B3_FORCE_INLINE size_t  allocSize(size_t size)
00034                 {
00035                         return (size ? size*2 : 1);
00036                 }

00040         b3OpenCLArray(cl_context ctx, cl_command_queue queue, size_t initialCapacity=0, bool allowGrowingCapacity=true)
00041         :m_size(0),  m_capacity(0),m_clBuffer(0),
00042         m_clContext(ctx),m_commandQueue(queue),
00043         m_ownsMemory(true),m_allowGrowingCapacity(true)
00044         {
00045                 if (initialCapacity)
00046                 {
00047                         reserve(initialCapacity);
00048                 }
00049                 m_allowGrowingCapacity = allowGrowingCapacity;
00050         }

00053         void setFromOpenCLBuffer(cl_mem buffer, size_t sizeInElements)
00054         {
00055                 deallocate();
00056                 m_ownsMemory = false;
00057                 m_allowGrowingCapacity = false;
00058                 m_clBuffer = buffer;
00059                 m_size = sizeInElements;
00060                 m_capacity = sizeInElements;

00084         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool push_back(const T& _Val,bool waitForCompletion=true)
00085         {
00086                 bool result = true;
00087                 size_t sz = size();
00088                 if( sz == capacity() )
00089                 {
00090                         result = reserve( allocSize(size()) );
00091                 }
00092                 copyFromHostPointer(&_Val, 1, sz, waitForCompletion);
00093                 m_size++;
00094                 return result;
00095         }
00096 
00097         B3_FORCE_INLINE T forcedAt(size_t n) const
00098         {
00099                 b3Assert(n>=0);
00100                 b3Assert(n<capacity());
00101                 T elem;
00102                 copyToHostPointer(&elem,1,n,true);
00103                 return elem;
00104         }
00105 
00106         B3_FORCE_INLINE T at(size_t n) const
00107         {
00108                 b3Assert(n>=0);
00109                 b3Assert(n<size());
00110                 T elem;
00111                 copyToHostPointer(&elem,1,n,true);
00112                 return elem;
00113         }

00115         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool resize(size_t newsize, bool copyOldContents=true)
00116         {
00117                 bool result = true;
00118                 size_t curSize = size();
00119 
00120                 if (newsize < curSize)
00121                 {
00122                         //leave the OpenCL memory for now
00123                 } else
00124                 {
00125                         if (newsize > size())
00126                         {
00127                                 result = reserve(newsize,copyOldContents);
00128                         }
00129 
00130                         //leave new data uninitialized (init in debug mode?)
00131                         //for (size_t i=curSize;i<newsize;i++) ...
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 if (result)
00135                 {
00136                         m_size = newsize;
00137                 } else
00138                 {
00139                         m_size = 0;
00140                 }
00141                 return result;
00142         }

00154         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool reserve(size_t _Count, bool copyOldContents=true)
00155         {
00156                 bool result=true;
00157                 // determine new minimum length of allocated storage
00158                 if (capacity() < _Count)
00159                 {       // not enough room, reallocate
00160 
00161                         if (m_allowGrowingCapacity)
00162                         {
00163                                 cl_int ciErrNum;
00164                                 //create a new OpenCL buffer
00165                                 size_t memSizeInBytes = sizeof(T)*_Count;
00166                                 cl_mem buf = clCreateBuffer(m_clContext, CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, memSizeInBytes, NULL, &ciErrNum);
00167                                 if (ciErrNum!=CL_SUCCESS)
00168                                 {
00169                                         b3Error("OpenCL out-of-memory\n");
00170                                         _Count = 0;
00171                                         result = false;
00172                                 }
00173 //#define B3_ALWAYS_INITIALIZE_OPENCL_BUFFERS
00174 #ifdef B3_ALWAYS_INITIALIZE_OPENCL_BUFFERS
00175                                 unsigned char* src = (unsigned char*)malloc(memSizeInBytes);
00176                                 for (size_t i=0;i<memSizeInBytes;i++)
00177                                         src[i] = 0xbb;
00178                                 ciErrNum = clEnqueueWriteBuffer( m_commandQueue, buf, CL_TRUE, 0, memSizeInBytes, src, 0,0,0 );
00179                                 b3Assert(ciErrNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00180                                 clFinish(m_commandQueue);
00181                                 free(src);
00182 #endif //B3_ALWAYS_INITIALIZE_OPENCL_BUFFERS
00183 
00184                                 if (result)
00185                                 {
00186                                         if (copyOldContents)
00187                                                 copyToCL(buf, size());
00188                                 }
00189 
00190                                 //deallocate the old buffer
00191                                 deallocate();
00192 
00193                                 m_clBuffer = buf;
00194 
00195                                 m_capacity = _Count;
00196                         } else
00197                         {
00198                                 //fail: assert and
00199                                 b3Assert(0);
00200                                 deallocate();
00201                                 result=false;
00202                         }
00203                 }
00204                 return result;
00205         }

00208         void copyToCL(cl_mem destination, size_t numElements, size_t firstElem=0, size_t dstOffsetInElems=0) const
00209         {
00210                 if (numElements<=0)
00211                         return;
00212 
00213                 b3Assert(m_clBuffer);
00214                 b3Assert(destination);
00215 
00216                 //likely some error, destination is same as source
00217                 b3Assert(m_clBuffer != destination);
00218 
00219                 b3Assert((firstElem+numElements)<=m_size);
00220 
00221                 cl_int status = 0;
00222 
00223 
00224                 b3Assert(numElements>0);
00225                 b3Assert(numElements<=m_size);
00226 
00227                 size_t srcOffsetBytes = sizeof(T)*firstElem;
00228                 size_t dstOffsetInBytes = sizeof(T)*dstOffsetInElems;
00229 
00230                 status = clEnqueueCopyBuffer( m_commandQueue, m_clBuffer, destination,
00231                         srcOffsetBytes, dstOffsetInBytes, sizeof(T)*numElements, 0, 0, 0 );
00232 
00233                 b3Assert( status == CL_SUCCESS );
00234         }
00235 
00236         void copyFromHost(const b3AlignedObjectArray<T>& srcArray, bool waitForCompletion=true)
00237         {
00238                 size_t newSize = srcArray.size();
00239 
00240                 bool copyOldContents = false;
00241                 resize (newSize,copyOldContents);
00242                 if (newSize)
00243                         copyFromHostPointer(&srcArray[0],newSize,0,waitForCompletion);
00244 
00245         }
00246 
00247         void copyFromHostPointer(const T* src, size_t numElems, size_t destFirstElem= 0, bool waitForCompletion=true)
00248         {
00249                 b3Assert(numElems+destFirstElem <= capacity());
00250 
00251                 if (numElems+destFirstElem)
00252                 {
00253                         cl_int status = 0;
00254                         size_t sizeInBytes=sizeof(T)*numElems;
00255                         status = clEnqueueWriteBuffer( m_commandQueue, m_clBuffer, 0, sizeof(T)*destFirstElem, sizeInBytes,
00256                         src, 0,0,0 );
00257                         b3Assert(status == CL_SUCCESS );
00258                         if (waitForCompletion)
00259                                 clFinish(m_commandQueue);
00260                 } else
00261                 {
00262                         b3Error("copyFromHostPointer invalid range\n");
00263                 }
00264         }
00265 
00266 
00267         void copyToHost(b3AlignedObjectArray<T>& destArray, bool waitForCompletion=true) const
00268         {
00269                 destArray.resize(this->size());
00270                 if (size())
00271                         copyToHostPointer(&destArray[0], size(),0,waitForCompletion);
00272         }
00273 
00274         void copyToHostPointer(T* destPtr, size_t numElem, size_t srcFirstElem=0, bool waitForCompletion=true) const
00275         {
00276                 b3Assert(numElem+srcFirstElem <= capacity());
00277 
00278                 if(numElem+srcFirstElem <= capacity())
00279                 {
00280                         cl_int status = 0;
00281                         status = clEnqueueReadBuffer( m_commandQueue, m_clBuffer, 0, sizeof(T)*srcFirstElem, sizeof(T)*numElem,
00282                         destPtr, 0,0,0 );
00283                         b3Assert( status==CL_SUCCESS );
00284 
00285                         if (waitForCompletion)
00286                                 clFinish(m_commandQueue);
00287                 } else
00288                 {
00289                         b3Error("copyToHostPointer invalid range\n");
00290                 }
00291         }
00292 
00293         void copyFromOpenCLArray(const b3OpenCLArray& src)
00294         {
00295                 size_t newSize = src.size();
00296                 resize(newSize);
00297                 if (size())
00298                 {
00299                         src.copyToCL(m_clBuffer,size());
00300                 }
00301         }
